<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/llm-providers/{provider}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This route allows you to get the configured LLM providers.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["openai","azure-openai","anthropic","bedrock","port"]},"in":"path","name":"provider","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
